DefaultReaderConfiguration.fullDescription: Collects events from Fortigate UTM appliances that use firmware version 300C.

file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastFormatter.format: ICMP CODE Destination is Administratively Prohibited
ICMP CODE Destination is Administratively Prohibited
ICMP CODE Destination Unreachable for Service
ICMP CODE Destination Host Unreachable for Service
ICMP CODE Precedence Cutoff in Effect
ICMP CODE Redirect for the Host
ICMP CODE Redirect for Service and Network
ICMP CODE Redirect for Service and Host
ICMP CODE Alternate Address for Host
ICMP CODE Time to Live exceeded in Transit
ICMP CODE Fragment Reassembly Time Exceeded
ICMP CODE Pointer indicates the error
ICMP CODE Missing a Required Option

FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) ([-\w.]+).*?date=[-\d]+ time=[\d: ]+ (.+) logid=(\d+) (.+) srcip=([a-f\d:.]+)[ srcport=]*(\d*) srcintf="?([^"]*)"? dstip=([a-f\d:.]+) [dstport=]*(\d*) *dstintf="?([^"]*)"?.* proto=\d+ (.+) policyid=\d+ (.+)

(\d+) ([-\w.]+).*?date=[-\d]+ time=[\d: ]+ (.+) logid=(\d+) (.+) srcip=([a-f\d:.]+) srcport=(\d+) srcintf="?([^"]*)"? dstip=([a-f\d:.]+) dstport=(\d+) dstintf="?([^"]*)"?.* proto=\d+ (.+) policyid=\d+ (.+)
(\d+) ([-\w.]+) date=[-\d]+ time=[\d: ]+ (.+) log_?id=(\d+)(.+) action="?perf-stats"? (cpu=\d+ mem=\d+ total_?session=\d+.*) msg="([^"]+)".*
